channel.title: Stompers-blogs on Röderstompers
channel.description: Recent content in Stompers-blogs on Röderstompers

item.title: Blog
item.description: GridSide Theme ============== The GridSide theme is a multi-page portfolio and blog utilizing the [Materialize][materialize] frontend framework. Comments can be added using Disqus. The theme contains a main page with a single grid of images representing different sections of the website. Sections can be post, gallery, or _project_ for various rendering. Current Materialize version is `0.97.0`. Current Font Awesome version is `4.4.0`. Current Masonry.js version is `3.3.1`. Current imagesLoaded.js version is `3.

item.title: GridSide Theme

The theme contains a main page with a single grid of images representing different sections of the website. Sections can be post, gallery, or project for various rendering.
